title: Bernie Sanders Claims to Oppose Tax Cut Heâ€™s About to Receive
sub_head: Rules out breaks for billionaires, but what about millionaires?
body:
One of the most entertaining Beltway games lately has been trying to guess exactly how late in the budget reconciliation process congressional Democrats would choose to insert an indefensible tax cut for themselves and their wealthy donors into the pending legislation. Looks like whoever picked early November is a winner!
The Senate Budget Committee announces in a late Tuesday afternoon press release:
